## Working with Other Data Structures
Challenge 1


```{r Challenge 1}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(stringr)
v <- ("Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed")
x <- str_split(v, " ")
x
y <- substr(x,1,22)
m <- matrix(data = y , nrow = 8, ncol = 3, byrow = TRUE)
m

```
Challenge 2
```{r Challenge 2}
m <- matrix(data = 1:80, nrow = 8, ncol = 10, byrow = FALSE)
m
x <- m[,c(2,3,6)]
x
x <- m[c(6:8),]
x

```
Challenge 3
```{r Challenge 3}
a <- array(data = 400:1, dim = c(5,5,4,4))
a[1, 1, 1, 2]
a[2, 3, 2,]
a[1:5, 1:5, 3, 3]
```
